about1: is a platform provides Non-Governmental organisations projects and job postings processes to be more quick and effective to save time and resources. ilil aims to access different funds both domestically and internationally, and it will provide AI-powered guides to facilitate users' access to projects that meet their needs. İlil, is especially important for the business world, provides customised notifications to optimize tender processes and direct companies to the right tenders. İlil has a significant mission at both national and international levels. İlil aims to provide solutions that are suitable for the economic conditions in Turkey while also aiming to increase education and employment opportunities for the young population, thus raising the overall welfare of society. It seeks to contribute to the economy by supporting local projects and increasing job opportunities.
about2: Our solution oriented approach will streamline the workload of institutions and organazations while saving time and resources for users Users will quickly and easily Access suitable donations and projects.
about3: Our platform will provide customized notifications for companies, SMEs and associations, directing them to the right tenders in the tender process. The platform supports youth employment and empowers our society to take steps towards a brighter future. It offers varios advantages for both young individuals and institutions. İlil is accelerating the world’s transition to a virtual factory.
about4: We are here to accompany you at every step you take.
about5: ilil will create new business opportunities both locally and globally and will contribute to the Turkish economy by increasing foreign investments.
